tooltip.horseinfomod.renderScale: Scale of the horse info overlay
tooltip.horseinfomod.margin: Margin in between items in the grid
tooltip.horseinfomod.roundNumbers: Toggles whether or not to round numbers
tooltip.horseinfomod.roundingPrecision: The number of decimal places to round to
tooltip.horseinfomod.percentColor1: Sets the first color of the percent bar
tooltip.horseinfomod.percentColor2: Sets the second color of the percent bar
tooltip.horseinfomod.overlayBackgroundTr: Sets the transparency of the overlay background
tooltip.horseinfomod.overlayForegroundTr: Sets the transparency of the overlay foreground
